title: After playing Malphite, he could use this small, yet reasonable, buff.
body:
As the title says...

{{champion:54}} is currently sitting at a 50%-51% win rate:
http://na.op.gg/champion/malphite/statistics/top
https://champion.gg/champion/Malphite/Top?league=

As {{champion:54}} is suppose to counter AD, I felt like he could use these very small, unnoticeable buffs.

E: Ground Slam

**New Effect** Enemy champions get their AD reduced by 30/35/40/45/50 for 3 seconds

R: Unstoppable Force

Knock-up duration increased from 1.5 seconds to 1.5/1.75/2 seconds

replies.body: Ground Slam already reduces Attack Speed -- it DOES NOT need to reduce AD, too.  Your suggestion is neither "small" or "reasonable".

> small, yet reasonable

Do you even know what these words mean?

Wait. 50-51 percent is balanced, maybe in line with a tiny nerf.

That's a huge buff. He would hard counter every AD champ with that.
50-51% winrate?? Too damn low. Buff him!
